price: Noa nkorͻfoͻ, ne Rassfoͻ, ne Samuudfoͻ no dii (Makafoͻ no) anim kan faa (Nyame asԑm) no atorᴐsԑm;
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
